content:
Here's my next response:

I'll definitely check out those SSD brands and models. Thanks for the tips on getting the most out of my SSD too! Speaking of performance, I've been having some issues with my laptop's battery life lately. I've been trying to keep it plugged in as much as possible, but sometimes I forget. Do you have any recommendations for portable power banks or external batteries that can help extend my laptop's battery life on the go?
